MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the ML10 postcode area of Strathaven, We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 9:36am. Our engineers have arrived onsite and our team will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 12:45pm. We will update this message if this information changes.  We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 11:26 AM on Monday, 07 December 2020.
